trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of selection requested using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de selecção pedido utilizando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: This flag represents either a single or multiple certificate selection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este sinalizador representa um único ou vários seleção de certificado utilizando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user can use the SHIFT or CRTL keys to select more than one X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode utilize as teclas SHIFT ou CRTL para selecionar mais do que um certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: The UI allows the user to select one X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: A IU permite ao utilizador selecionar um certificado x.&509;.
